title: But When the Skeletons Come To the Door
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:monotypical]]

[[module css]]
:root {
    --linkColor: #FF4838;

    --primaryBackgroundColor: #242935;
    --secondaryBackgroundColor: #3F4256;
    --tertiaryBackgroundColor: #809EB2;
    --borderColor: #6272A4;

    --shadow: rgba(96,213,248,0.3);

    --selectionColor: #50FA7B;
    --textColor: #F8F8F2;
    --textColor-alt: #6272A4;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: var(--secondaryBackgroundColor);
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=EstrellaYoshte]]

[[[art:estrella-illustration-desk|The Other Artdesk]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

[[div class="meta-title"]]
But When the Skeletons Come To the Door
[[/div]]

[[image https://i.imgur.com/F3uMcno.jpg]]

------

My visualization of [[*user Ralliston]] and [[*user trotskyeet]]'s [[[SCP-5572]]]. I know the big guy probably isn't a skeleton, but I choose to exercise my creative rights :P
